rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0001
rows.name:
The Karam Ruins...
What an impressive location this is.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0002
rows.name:
It's a place worthy of performing
the script I wrote.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0003
rows.name:
Though it's somewhat deteriorated,
and could use some restoration work...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0004
rows.name: Hey, Yoshitsune.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0005
rows.name:
Forget about that and make
us some dinner instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0006
rows.name:
You're far more helpful in the kitchen
than you are writing scripts, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0007
rows.name: How terribly rude.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0008
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0009
rows.name: What kind of cooking are you good at?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0010
rows.name: I'm more interested in the script.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0011
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0012
rows.name: What kind of cooking are you good at?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0013
rows.name: I'm more interested in the script though.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0014
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0015
rows.name: What kind of cooking are you skilled at?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0016
rows.name: I'm interested in the script, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0017
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0018
rows.name: What cooking are you good at?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0019
rows.name: I'm more interested in the script though.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0101
rows.name:
So you're also one who
prefers substance over style?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0102
rows.name:
Ahahaha
That can't be helped.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0103
rows.name:
Your cooking skills far outshine
your writing talents, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0104
rows.name:
Plus, I've always just eaten
what you made with delight
without giving it much thought...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0105
rows.name:
I have no idea what dishes
you specialize in either.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0106
rows.name:
That's because I've only been making
things that you like.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0107
rows.name: Well, that was thoughtful of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0108
rows.name: Such thankless work...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0109
rows.name:
That said, I don't really have
any signature dishes.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0110
rows.name: Though I do have dishes I'm not good at.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0111
rows.name: The Avaritia Monkfish.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0112
rows.name:
I have no idea how to make
anything edible from that
grotesque-looking fish...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0113
rows.name: It's completely beyond my imagination.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0114
rows.name:
Isn't that just because
you dislike the fish's appearance?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0115
rows.name:
What are you talking about!
Visual presentation is crucial
in cuisine!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0116
rows.name:
How could anyone possibly create
something beautiful and tasty using
such a hideous fish!?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0117
rows.name:
Nobody could possibly have an appetite
when faced with such a thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0118
rows.name:
That bloated, slimy creature
whose appearance is too revolting to even
be called a fish...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0119
rows.name: The mere thought makes my skin crawl!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0120
rows.name:
You're making all kinds
of excuses, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0121
rows.name:
Bottom line, you just don't want
to touch that fish, do you?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0122
rows.name: Naturally.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0123
rows.name:
I have no desire to soil my hands
with such a creature.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0124
rows.name:
So there's a fish that intimidates
Yoshitsune... Perhaps we should
get Homura to cook it sometime.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0125
rows.name: Wha-?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0126
rows.name:
Well, even if you can't manage,
Yoshitsune, I bet Homura could make a
tasty meal out of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0127
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0128
rows.name:
Hearing Benkei say that makes me feel
I must absolutely take on
the Avaritia Monkfish challenge.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0129
rows.name: So you'll give it a shot sometime soon?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0130
rows.name:
Very well.
I can't allow myself to lose to Homura...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0131
rows.name:
I can't wait to taste your cooking,
Yoshitsune!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0132
rows.name:
Yoshitsune's cooking...
I'm looking forward to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0133
rows.name:
Yoshitsune's cooking...
I look forward to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0134
rows.name:
Yoshitsune's cooking...
I'm lookin' forward to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0135
rows.name:
Heh...
Please look forward to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0201
rows.name:
As expected of my Driver.
You understand well.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0202
rows.name:
I've started writing a script
with you as the main character, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0203
rows.name:
Let's make you look much, much cooler
than in reality.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0204
rows.name:
As an unparalleled, supreme hero
who excels in both literary
and martial arts.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0205
rows.name:
That kind of role hardly seems
fitting
for our Driver, though...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0206
rows.name:
As for you, Benkei...
I'll cast you as a gluttonous,
nap-loving lazy girl.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0207
rows.name: Wha-?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0208
rows.name: Hey, I'm not worthless!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0209
rows.name:
I might be a bit lazy sometimes,
but I come through when it matters,
and I'm powerful too...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0210
rows.name:
However, our group is already filled
with such formidable individuals.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0211
rows.name:
Including a gluttonous nap-loving lazy
 girl will add to the variety and make
the story much more entertaining.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0212
rows.name:
If that's the case, surely this
gluttonous, nap-loving lazy girl
could be someone other than me?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0213
rows.name:
My goal is to make you memorable,Benkei.
I wouldn't want you to become 
forgettable and blend in with everyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0214
rows.name: Then give me a different role.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0215
rows.name:
You don't find the gluttonous,
nap-loving lazy girl role appealing?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0216
rows.name:
I absolutely do not want to be portrayed
as a gluttonous, nap-loving lazy girl!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0217
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0218
rows.name:
In that case, Rex,
you'll take the role of
the gluttonous, nap-loving lazy boy.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0219
rows.name: No way!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0220
rows.name:
In that case,
Nia, you'll take the role of
the gluttonous, nap-loving lazy girl.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0221
rows.name: Absolutely not!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0222
rows.name:
In that case, Meleph,
you'll take the role of
the gluttonous, nap-loving lazy girl.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0223
rows.name:
I'm hardly young enough to be called a
girl... Moreover, wouldn't such trait
hinder the plot's advancement?

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0224
rows.name:
In that case, Zeke,
you'll take the role of the gluttonous,
nap-loving lazy middle-aged man.

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0225
rows.name:
I ain't middle-aged yet!
Besides, who'd want a main character
like that?!

rows.label: kizunatalk049_msg0226
rows.name: Good grief...
